libQGLViewer Documentation

Version 1.3.7

QGLViewer is an open source C++ library which enables you to quickly start the development of a new 3D application. It is designed for 3D developers, who can very easily display and move around a 3D scene by simply providing the OpenGL orders that define their 3D geometry. The viewer provides some useful classical functionalities such as a camera trackball, screenshot saving, manipulated frames with possible constraints, stereo display...

QGLViewer is not a 3D viewer that can be used directly to view 3D scenes in various formats, it is actually more likely to be the starting point for the coding of such a viewer.

See the project main page for details on the project and installation steps.
